thread.title: One of the better places to stay in Paris. Excellent Property
thread.title_full: One of the better places to stay in Paris. Excellent Property - Review of Mandarin Oriental, Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Trip718
title: One of the better places to stay in Paris. Excellent Property
text:
This hotel is a home away from home. Super comfortable the good is excellent, the rooms are beautiful and you can rest here. Special place. You willl leave renewed
The hotel is centrally located and near the museums and shops.
Room Tip: Great property See more room tips
